examples: resentment flared at such an unmannered intrusion

definitions.text: (of persons) lacking in refinement or grace
lacking civility or good manners; - Willa Cather
examples: want nothing from you but to get away from your uncivil tongue

definitions.text: (used especially of commodities) being unprocessed or manufactured using only simple or minimal processes
belonging to an early stage of technical development; characterized by simplicity and (often) crudeness
examples: the crude weapons and rude agricultural implements of early man
primitive living conditions in the Appalachian mountains
